Introduction: Uh, who are you?#$b#%Kyle looks you up and down.#$b#Okay, whatever. As long as you don't bother me I don't care.
divorced: Get out of my way.#$b#I should've known you were just a waste of my time.
secondChance_Boys: You want to start over? After throwing me away like trash?#$b#...God, I hate you so much...$4#$b#But at the same time... I do want you back.$3
Mon: Oh, hey, @. How's it going?#$b#Uh-huh, interesting. I'll get going now.
Mon2: %Kyle seems lost in his thoughts#$e#I'm thinking about going to the city today.
Mon4: Hey, @. Which part of the city did you live in before moving here?#$b#Oh, that's fun. One of my friends lives there.$1
Mon6: Oh, hey. How are you?#$b#Not like I actually care, just say it's okay and move on.
Tue: %Kyle doesn't seem too amused by your story.
Wed: Pelican Town is so boring. Nothing is happening here, ever.#$e#Exactly why I want to move out.
Tue4: Hey, @. Do you like the music festivals they hold in the city every other month?#$b#You don't seem like the fun type. But we could go together the next time there is one, I guess.$1
Wed2: How is farm life treating you so far?#$b#I might need a back-up plan.
Wed4: You ever spoke to Sebastian? He's a cool guy.
Thu: Eden keeps nagging me that I have to quit smoking.#$e#Last time I checked, he was my best friend, not my mother.
Thu4: Aubrey is so obnoxious.#$e#He really should just mind his own bussiness.
Fri: Hey, it's Friday! Are you coming to the Saloon tonight?$1#$b#No, I'm not inviting you. I'll be with my friends.#$e#Nobody can stop you from going alone, though.
Fri2: It's always a tough choice if I want to spend my Friday with my friends here or my friends from the city.#$e#I think I'll stay.#$e#Why are you still here?
Fri4: I'm so ready to get wasted tonight...$1#$e#No, not an invitation.
Sat: I appreciate how friendly you are, but can you tone it down?#$e#I'm growing sick of you.
Sat2: %Kyle is giving you silent treatment. He's smiling, though.
Sat4: Has anyone ever told you that your smile is obnoxious?#$b#No? Well, glad to be the first one.$1#$e#What? Did I touch a nerve?
Sat6: Hey, do you have a lot to do today?#$b#Good, go take care of those things instead of talking to me.#$e#Seriously, go.$1
Sat8: What do you want?#$e#Oh my god, you're obsessed.$1

Sun4: Hi, what's up?#$b#I don't actually care.
Sun6: Is that your natural hair color?#$b#It's cool.$1

Mon10: Ugh, it's you...$1#$b#What do you want now?$1
Tue6: Don't ever talk to Victor, he's weird as hell.#$b#Last night he woke us all up by having Kenny pretend like he's a burglar.#$b#...All to 'see our reactions'. Bro.#$e#I nearly killed Kenny for this...
Tue8: You met Eden, yet?#$b#Cool, don't talk to him. You seem like bad influence.$1
Tue10: Aubrey keeps complaining about my soda can collection.#$b#It's in my room, so how does that bother him?#$e#...He should get a life.

Wed6: ...#$e#...#$e#Stop talking so much, you remind me of Haley.
